Package gate.learning.learners

Class Summary
ChunkOrEntity One chunk with start and end instance indexes, label index, and probablity.
DataForLearning Data used for learning, read from the feature vector file.
InThreadExecutorService Simplest possible executor service that just runs the tasks in the calling thread.
Multi2BinaryClass Convert a multi-class problem into several binary problems.
MultiClassLearning Learning and application by converting the multi-class problem into several binary class problems.
Paum The Java implementation of the PAUM learning algorithm, the Perceptron algorithm with uneven margins.
PaumForExec  
PostProcessing Post-processing the resutls from the classifiers for annotate text.
SupervisedLearner The abstract class for supervised binary learner.
SvmForExec  
SvmLibSVM SVM traning using the LibSVM and SVM classification.
